channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man suspected in Brown University shooting and MIT professor’s killing is found dead, officials say
item.description: Officials say a man who is suspected in last weekend’s mass shooting at Brown University and in the fatal shooting of a Massachusetts Institute of Technology professor has been found dead in a New Hampshire storage facility.

item.title: How 1 anonymous tipster cracked the Brown University shooting case
Trump suspends green card lottery program that let Brown University, MIT shootings suspect into US
